languages.text: "И я надеюсь, что вы сделали выводы о важности охраны ваших ключевых миров. Весь Простор пылает. Ваша столица — все еще наиболее безопасное место в Коронусе". {n}Префект пытается что-то сказать, но маршал с нажимом чеканит:{/n} "И это — не обсуждается".

traits.locale_text: "И я надеюсь, что вы сделали выводы о важности охраны ваших ключевых миров. Весь Простор пылает. Ваша столица — все еще наиболее безопасное место в Коронусе". {n}Префект пытается что-то сказать, но Маршал с нажимом чеканит:{/n} "И это — не обсуждается".

languages.text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."
languages.original_text: "И я надеюсь, что вы сделали выводы о важности охраны ваших ключевых миров. Весь Простор пылает. Ваша столица — все еще наиболее безопасное место в Коронусе". {n}Префект пытается что-то сказать, но маршал с нажимом чеканит:{/n} "И это — не обсуждается".

traits.locale_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is ablaze. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The Prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

"And I hope that you have drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds." {n}The Marshal raises an eyebrow, then sighs.{/n} "The Expanse burns, all of it. We have no safer option."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds." {n}The Marshal raises an eyebrow, then sighs.{/n} "The Expanse burns, all of it. We have no safer option."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds." {n}The Marshal raises an eyebrow, then sighs.{/n} "The Expanse burns, all of it. We have no safer option."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds." {n}The Marshal raises an eyebrow, then sighs.{/n} "The Expanse burns, all of it. We have no safer option."

"And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is ablaze. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The Prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

languages.text: « Et j'ose espérer que vous en avez tiré les leçons quant à l'importance de placer vos mondes clés sous bonne garde. Les Étendues sont une véritable poudrière. Votre capitale demeure l'endroit le plus sûr de tout Koronus. » {n}La préfète voudrait répliquer, mais le maréchal poursuit d'un ton catégorique :{/n} « Ce n'est pas négociable. »
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

traits.locale_text: « Et j'ose espérer que vous en avez tiré les leçons quant à l'importance de placer vos mondes clés sous bonne garde. Les Étendues sont une véritable poudrière. Votre capitale demeure l'endroit le plus sûr de tout Koronus. » {n}La préfète voudrait répliquer, mais le maréchal poursuit d'un ton catégorique :{/n} « Ce n'est pas négociable. »

languages.text: «Y espero que haya sacado conclusiones desde entonces sobre la necesidad de proteger sus mundos esenciales. La Extensión entera está ardiendo. Su capital sigue siendo el lugar más seguro de Koronus». {n}La prefecta intenta hablar, pero el Mariscal continúa, acentuando cada palabra:{/n} «Esto no es debatible».
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

traits.locale_text: «Y espero que haya sacado conclusiones desde entonces sobre la necesidad de proteger sus mundos esenciales. La Extensión entera está ardiendo. Su capital sigue siendo el lugar más seguro de Koronus». {n}La prefecta intenta hablar, pero el Mariscal continúa, acentuando cada palabra:{/n} «Esto no es debatible».

languages.text: “那我希望你从这次袭击中吸取了经验，意识到核心世界的安全至关重要。整个科罗努斯扩区都化成了一片火海，而你的首都世界是整个扩区最安全的地方。”{n}行政官开了口，想说些什么，但元帅继续说了下去，一字一句道。{/n}“这件事情没有讨论余地。”
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

traits.locale_text: “那我希望你从这次袭击中吸取了经验，意识到核心世界的安全至关重要。整个科罗努斯扩区都化成了一片火海，而你的首都世界是整个扩区最安全的地方。”{n}行政官开了口，想说些什么，但元帅继续说了下去，一字一句道。{/n}“这件事情没有讨论余地。”

languages.text: "Und ich hoffe, dass Ihr seitdem einige Schlüsse hinsichtlich der Verteidigung Eurer Schlüsselwelten gezogen habt." Die gesamte Ausdehnung steht in Flammen. Eure Hauptwelt bleibt der sicherste Ort in Koronus." {n}Die Präfektin will das Wort erheben, doch der Marschall fährt unbeirrt fort:{/n} "Und das steht nicht zur Diskussion."
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich hoffe, dass Ihr seitdem einige Schlüsse hinsichtlich der Verteidigung Eurer Schlüsselwelten gezogen habt." Die gesamte Ausdehnung steht in Flammen. Eure Hauptwelt bleibt der sicherste Ort in Koronus." {n}Die Präfektin will das Wort erheben, doch der Marschall fährt unbeirrt fort:{/n} "Und das steht nicht zur Diskussion."

languages.text: 「ですので、それ以来、あなたの大切な惑星を守ることについての結論を出すことを望んでいます」{n}将帥は眉を上げ、それからため息をつく。{/n}「エクスパンスはすべて燃えています。私たちにはより安全な選択肢がありません」
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds." {n}The Marshal raises an eyebrow, then sighs.{/n} "The Expanse burns, all of it. We have no safer option."

traits.locale_text: 「ですので、それ以来、あなたの大切な惑星を守ることについての結論を出すことを望んでいます」{n}将帥は眉を上げ、それからため息をつく。{/n}「エクスパンスはすべて燃えています。私たちにはより安全な選択肢がありません」

languages.text: "Umarım kilit dünyalarınızı korumanın önemi hususunda gerekli dersleri çıkarmışsınızdır. Enginlik'in tamamı yanıyor. Başkentiniz, Koronus'taki en güvenli yer konumunu koruyor." {n}Vali konuşmaya çalışsa da Miralay, her bir sözcüğü açıkça telaffuz ederek devam ediyor.{/n} "Bu konu, tartışmaya kapalı."
languages.original_text: "And I hope that you have since drawn some conclusions about the importance of guarding your key worlds. The entire Expanse is on fire. Your capital remains the safest place in Koronus." {n}The prefect attempts to speak, but the Marshal presses on, enunciating each word:{/n} "And this is not open to discussion."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım kilit dünyalarınızı korumanın önemi hususunda gerekli dersleri çıkarmışsınızdır. Enginlik'in tamamı yanıyor. Başkentiniz, Koronus'taki en güvenli yer konumunu koruyor." {n}Vali konuşmaya çalışsa da Miralay, her bir sözcüğü açıkça telaffuz ederek devam ediyor.{/n} "Bu konu, tartışmaya kapalı."
